title: Blackstone Extends Bet on Grocery Stores in Texas Property Deal
description: Blackstone Inc. is acquiring a collection of Texas retail properties, increasing its wager on real estate anchored by grocery stores.
content: Blackstone Inc. is acquiring a collection of Texas retail properties, increasing its wager on real estate anchored by grocery stores.
